name: Breaded Parmesan Chicken
author: Anonymous
summary: A filling, rich breaded chicken that is baked. A comfort food that is good with mashed potatoes!
ingredients: ½ cup finely crushed herb-seasoned stuffing mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a small shallow dish combine the stuffing mix, cheese, parsley, curry powder and seasoning
In an 8x11 inch baking dish, melt the butter/margarine in the microwave
Dip the chicken breasts in the stuffing mixture, coating both sides of each breast
Place chicken in baking dish and sprinkle any leftover stuffing mixture over the chicken
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, then turn chicken pieces over and bake for another 20 to 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through
